request.description: The API route retrieves all the stored coffee beans

response.name: Get Coffee Beans
response.body:
[
    {
        "_id": "62613c857a9198d8b0c1d48c",
        "name": "Strawberry Decaf",
        "brand": "SAN MARCO COFFEE INC",
        "roastProfile": "Medium",
        "roastType": "Blend",
        "price": 300,
        "countryOfOrigin": "USA",
        "description": "Full flavor strawberries make up this favorite!",
        "__v": 0
    },
    {
        "_id": "62613c857a9198d8b0c1d48d",
        "name": "Private Reserve Espresso",
        "brand": "COMMUNITY COFFEE CO LLC",
        "roastProfile": "Dark",
        "roastType": "Blend",
        "price": 500,
        "countryOfOrigin": "USA",
        "description": "The rich, caramelized flavor of our signature Espresso is expertly blended and roasted extra dark to create a full-bodied coffee taste that can be enjoyed straight or in your favorite drink. Made from 100% specialty-grade Arabica coffee.",
        "__v": 0
    },
    {
        "_id": "62613c857a9198d8b0c1d48e",
        "name": "Guatemala Huehuetenango",
        "brand": "FABLE COFFEE",
        "roastProfile": "Medium",
        "roastType": "Blend",
        "price": 300,
        "countryOfOrigin": "Guatemala",
        "description": "Personality: “One more cup of coffee and then I’ll go… Tasting Notes: Baker’s Chocolate, Caramel, Peach Brew Method: Very versatile coffee. All drip methods, cold brew, & great as a single origin espresso.",
        "__v": 0
    },
    {
        "_id": "62613c857a9198d8b0c1d48f",
        "name": "Aida Batlle Kilimanjaro",
        "brand": "COFFEE LABS ROASTERS",
        "roastProfile": "Medium",
        "roastType": "Single Origin",
        "price": 250,
        "countryOfOrigin": "USA",
        "description": "Grown at the Santa Ana Volcano in El Salvador, by renowned coffee producer Aida Batlle. In 2003, Aida Batlle took the entire specialty world by surprise. The Kilimanjaro (named for East Africa’s highest peak) not only won El Salvador’s Cup of Excellence Award; but it sold for a world record–shattering $14.06 per pound. More than a decade later, and Aida Batlle’s coffees continue to astound.",
        "__v": 0
    }
]

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Organic Espresso",
    "brand": "CAFF D'ARTE",
    "roastProfile": "Medium",
    "roastType": "Blend",
    "price": 600,
    "countryOfOrigin": "United States of America",
    "description": "With certified organic beans chosen from the finest varietals, the Organico blend is crafted to taste great as espresso or drip coffee. Roasted medium-dark for a bright, natural earthy flavor profile that is smooth and tasty."
}

request.description: This API route is used to add a new coffee bean to the database.

response.name: Create Coffee Bean

request.description: This API route is used to create a new coffee brew based on existing coffee beans. It also provisions the ability to attach user votes /ratings
This API route enables us to retrieve all coffee brews in the database
This API route allows us to retrieve a coffee brew based on it's ID in the database.
This API route allows us to update information about a particular coffee brew based on it's ID in the database
This API route allows us to delete a particular Coffee brew based on it's ID in the database
This API route allows a user to retrieve the Top 5 grinding levels of a particular coffee bean based on the origin and amount of water to prepare it.

response.name: Query Top 5 grinding levels
response.body:
Top grinding levels

  • 7 → with 5 user-votes
  • 5 → with 4 user-votes
  • 3 → with 2 user-votes

request.description: This API route is used to create a new user in the database.
This API route enables is retrieve all users in the database
This API route is used to delete a user from the database based on their ID
This API route is used to populate the database with a list of users at once.
This is the default API route

response.name: Default API Route
response.body:
Coffee Brew API

Version: 1.0.0

API for information about coffee beans, brews, and customer ratings for those brews
